entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog dissipating early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
